name: kiddo
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used as a friendly way of speaking to a child or young person, especially one you know well: Careful kiddo, stay close to me. You want a piece of cake, kiddo?
mainly US a child: What a cute kiddo you have. This recipe is perfect for any kiddos who like to help out in the kitchen.
More examplesFewer examplesYou don't want that, kiddo.She always calls me "kiddo".It's always nice to have someone say something positive about your kiddos .There's a special kiddo section of the restaurant, complete with toys.
